sys_script_email.name: accept_reject

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_email_95c9d8e4c3c95210fef230ec05013146
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accept_reject</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript(current, template, email, email_action, event) {
    var action = event.action; 
    var ticketSysId = current.sys_id; 
    
    var gr = new GlideRecord('Email [x_1527610_hrm_hrm_tickets]');
    if (gr.get(ticketSysId)) {
        if (action === 'Accept') {
            gr.state = 'Closed'; 

        } else if (action === 'reject') {
            gr.state = 'Assigned'; 
        }
        gr.update(); 
    }
})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-10-01 09:00:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>95c9d8e4c3c95210fef230ec05013146</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accept_reject</sys_name><sys_package display_value="HRM" source="x_1527610_hrm">25a151d047301210079550fe316d4354</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="HRM">25a151d047301210079550fe316d4354</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_95c9d8e4c3c95210fef230ec05013146</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-01 09:00:43</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
